allow: Bash(node -e "try { new Function\(require\(''fs''\).readFileSync\(''C:\\Users\\Acer\\Downloads\\Interaktives Lernen\\app.js'', ''utf8''\)\); console.log\(''Syntax OK''\); } catch\(e\) { console.error\(''Syntax Error:'', e.message\); }")

Bash(powershell -File - <<'PS1'
$c = [System.IO.File]::ReadAllText\('C:\\Users\\Acer\\Downloads\\Interaktives Lernen\\app.js'\)
$ob = \([char[]]$c | Where-Object { $_ -eq [char]'{' } | Measure-Object\).Count
$cb = \([char[]]$c | Where-Object { $_ -eq [char]'}' } | Measure-Object\).Count
$op = \([char[]]$c | Where-Object { $_ -eq [char]'\(' } | Measure-Object\).Count
$cp = \([char[]]$c | Where-Object { $_ -eq [char]'\)' } | Measure-Object\).Count
Write-Host "Braces: open=$ob close=$cb"
Write-Host "Parens: open=$op close=$cp"
PS1)

Bash(powershell -File - <<'PS1'
foreach \($f in @\('C:\\Users\\Acer\\Downloads\\Interaktives Lernen\\app.js','C:\\Users\\Acer\\Downloads\\Interaktives Lernen\\recorder.js'\)\) {
  $c = [System.IO.File]::ReadAllText\($f\)
  $ob = \([char[]]$c | Where-Object { $_ -eq [char]'{' } | Measure-Object\).Count
  $cb = \([char[]]$c | Where-Object { $_ -eq [char]'}' } | Measure-Object\).Count
  $op = \([char[]]$c | Where-Object { $_ -eq [char]'\(' } | Measure-Object\).Count
  $cp = \([char[]]$c | Where-Object { $_ -eq [char]'\)' } | Measure-Object\).Count
  $name = [System.IO.Path]::GetFileName\($f\)
  Write-Host "$name - Braces: $ob/$cb  Parens: $op/$cp"
}
PS1)
